notes.text:
This update for libXcursor fixes the following security issue:

- CVE-2015-9262: _XcursorThemeInherits allowed remote attackers to cause denial
  of service or potentially code execution via a one-byte heap overflow
  (bsc#1103511).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: _XcursorThemeInherits in library.c in libXcursor before 1.1.15 allows remote attackers to cause denial of service or potentially code execution via a one-byte heap overflow.
